Description:
Civil Engineer (Nigeria)To work in a civil engineering contracting company with an emphasis on the construction of roads and bridges.Project Planning: Collaborate with clients, architects, and other stakeholders to define project objectives, scope, and requirements. Develop comprehensive project plans, budgets, and timelines.
Design and Analysis: Create detailed engineering designs for various projects, such as structures, roads, utilities, and foundations. Conduct structural analysis, calculations, and simulations to ensure design integrity.
Permitting and Regulations: Navigate through regulatory approvals, permits, and compliance requirements for construction projects. Ensure that designs adhere to local, regional, and national building codes and regulations.
Site Investigation: Conduct site visits and assessments to understand site conditions, soil properties, and potential challenges. Gather data for design optimization and feasibility studies.
Construction Management: Oversee construction activities, manage contractors and subcontractors, and ensure that projects are executed according to plans and specifications.Skills
Skills:
University Degree
Minimum of 5 years of Experience in Road Construction
Age less than 40 years
Experience in Nigeria is a plus
Lebanese Nationality
Sense of Leadership
